name: Second Opinion
description: Runs code reviews using external LLM CLIs (OpenAI Codex, Google Gemini) on uncommitted changes, branch diffs, or specific commits
longDescription: Plugin with a single `second-opinion` skill invoked via `/second-opinion`. Shells out to `codex review` and/or `gemini` CLI to review uncommitted changes, branch diffs, or specific commits. Supports 4 review focus areas: general, security, performance, and error handling. Runs both tools by default and presents results side by side. Includes 2 reference docs (`codex-invocation.md`, `gemini-invocation.md`) with model configurations. Optionally passes `CLAUDE.md`/`AGENTS.md` as project context for project-aware reviews.
